meanings.definition: A small bud or outgrowth capable of developing into a new individual.
meanings.sent1: The gemmule on the plant was ready to grow into a new flower.
meanings.sent2: The gemmule formed on the tree branch will soon become a leaf.
meanings.sent3: The gemmule decided it was time to sprout and explore the world.
meanings.sent4: The gemmule held the promise of a bright future for the plant.
meanings.sent5: The gemmule shimmered in the sunlight, full of potential.

meanings.definition: A small asexual reproductive structure produced by certain sponges.
meanings.sent1: The gemmule released by the sponge would develop into a new sponge.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the gemmule to understand sponge reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The gemmule from the sponge had a secret plan to clone itself.
meanings.sent4: The gemmule was like a tiny seed of life within the sponge.
meanings.sent5: The gemmule floated in the water, waiting to create life.

meanings.definition: A small rounded mass of cells produced by certain plants for asexual reproduction.
meanings.sent1: The gemmule from the plant was carefully collected for propagation.
meanings.sent2: Farmers used the gemmule to grow new plants quickly.
meanings.sent3: The gemmule from the plant was a master at cloning itself.
meanings.sent4: The gemmule held the key to endless plant reproduction.
meanings.sent5: The gemmule multiplied rapidly, ensuring the plant's survival.
